statements: SELECT * FROM interactions;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_date, interaction_time FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT support_agent_id, interaction_description FROM interactions WHERE interaction_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE support_agent_id = 200 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_description FROM interactions WHERE interaction_id = 500;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC, interaction_time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, support_agent_id, interaction_date, interaction_description FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 456 ORDER BY interaction_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, support_agent_id, interaction_description FROM interactions WHERE support_agent_id = 789 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC, interaction_time DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY customer_id ASC, interaction_time ASC LIMIT 7;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_date, interaction_time FROM interactions WHERE interaction_description LIKE '%issue%' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC, interaction_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type='call'
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_location='New York'
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_timestamp, interaction_description FROM interactions WHERE agent_id=5
SELECT * FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_email IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_location = 'New York';
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type, interaction_description FROM interactions WHERE agent_id = 3 AND interaction_type = 'Complaint' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_description LIKE '%resolved%' AND interaction_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_location FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC, customer_location DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_interaction_history;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_timestamp, interaction_details FROM customer_interaction_history WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT agent_name, agent_department FROM support_agents WHERE agent_department = 'Sales';
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN customer_interaction_history ON customers.customer_id = customer_interaction_history.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_interaction_history WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 10;
SELECT agent_name, agent_department FROM support_agents WHERE agent_id = 3;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_timestamp, interaction_details FROM customer_interaction_history WHERE support_agent_id = 2;

SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email, agent_name, agent_email FROM customers JOIN customer_interaction_history ON customers.customer_id = customer_interaction_history.customer_id JOIN support_agents ON customer_interaction_history.support_agent_id = support_agents.agent_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, contact_info FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT agent_name, department, email FROM support_agents ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_date, interaction_type, interaction_details FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Phone Call';
SELECT log_id, log_time, log_description FROM interaction_logs ORDER BY log_time DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id WHERE interaction_type = 'Email' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT agent_name, department FROM support_agents WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type IN ('Call', 'Chat') ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM interactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_interactions > 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type='Complaint';
SELECT agent_name, agent_email FROM support_agents WHERE agent_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT interaction_date, message, rating FROM interaction_details ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM support_agents;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT agent_name, agent_email, agent_phone FROM support_agents WHERE agent_phone LIKE '%555%';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, agent_name FROM customers c JOIN interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id JOIN support_agents s ON i.agent_id = s.agent_id;
SELECT report_date, details FROM reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
